utterances: how to care for your eyes
answers: Maintain a balanced diet rich in vitamin A and beta-carotene for healthy eyes.
Wear sunglasses with UV protection to shield your eyes from harmful sun rays.
Take regular breaks from screen time to reduce eye strain.
Get a comprehensive eye exam at least once a year.
Keep your scalp clean and free from excessive oil.
Avoid using excessive heat styling tools on your hair.
Use a deep conditioning treatment once a week for added moisture.
Trim your hair regularly to prevent split ends.
Limit alcohol consumption to protect your liver.
Eat foods rich in antioxidants like berries and leafy greens.
Stay hydrated by drinking plenty of water throughout the day.
Consider a liver detox diet under medical supervision if needed.
